General.Name: TCL Corp
General.Description: TCL Technology Group Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the semiconductors business worldwide. The company operates through four segments: Semiconductor Display Business, New Energy Photovoltaic and Semiconductor Materials Business, Distribution Business, and Other Businesses. The Semi-Conductor Display Business segment offers semi-conductor display panels and semi-conductor display modules, as well as display processing.  The New Energy Photovoltaic and Semi-Conductor Materials Business segment is involved in manufacture and sale of semi-conductor materials, semi-conductor devices, new energy materials and new energy; and the development and operation of photovoltaic power station projects. The Distribution Business segment engages in the sale of computers, software, tablet computers, mobile phones, and other electronic products. The Others Businesses segment engages in industrial finance and investment business, as well as offers technology development and patent maintenance services. The company was formerly known as TCL Corporation and changed its name to TCL Technology Group Corporation in February 2020. TCL Technology Group Corporation was founded in 1981 and is based in Huizhou, China.
